text: Rhyscotus rotundatus is a species of armadillo woodlice, a terrestrial crustacean isopod of the family Rhyscotidae. It is endemic to the island of São Tomé in São Tomé and Príncipe. The species was described in 1978 by Helmut Schmalfuss and Franco Ferrara. ==References== ==Further reading== * Schmalfuss, H. 2003. World catalog of terrestrial isopods (Isopoda: Oniscidea). Stuttgarter Beiträge zur Naturkunde, Serie A Nr. 654: 341 pp. Category:Woodlice Category:Endemic fauna of São Tomé Island Category:Invertebrates of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Crustaceans described in 1978
title: Rhyscotus rotundatus
